title: Heart On My Sleeve Drake & Selena Vazquez
lyrics:
6 ContributorsHeart On My Sleeve Drake & Selena Vazquez Lyrics[Intro: Drake]I came in with my ex like Selena, to flex, ayBumping Justin Bieber, the fever ain’t left, ayShe know what she need, Anita, she blessed, ayGiving it my best, aye, yeahI got my heart on my sleeve with a knife in my back—What’s with that? Ay21, I love him, that’s my brother, that’s my slatt, ayMetro made the beat, so you know that it’s gon’ slap, ayYeah, it’s gon’ slap, ayTell her run it back[Bridge: Drake]Talking to a diva, yeah, she on my nervesShe think that I need her—kick her to the curbAll I know is you coulda had the worldHad the world—yeah, you were my world[Verse: Selena Vazquez ]If i have money have it  even if million dollars travis thought a couple movies on Nes i hit fool your Mother  soundtrack get your back 80 HD Travis i can’t feel off this super fantasy all fantasy  smell to plastic no can Handle me l’m going in the shit to strong make to long i make to much make to far i might not making it might might not making it this time might not making it[Bridge: selena Vazquez ]Talking to a diva, yeah, she on my nervesShe think that I need her—kick her to the curbAll I know is you coulda had the worldHad the world—yeah, you were my-



[Chorus: Drake]I came in with my ex like Selena, to flex, ayBumping Justin Bieber, the fever ain’t left, ayShe know what she need, Anita, she blessed, ayGiving it my best, aye, yeahI got my heart on my sleeve with a knife in my back—What’s with that? Ay21, I love him, that’s my brother, that’s my slatt, ayMetro made the beat, so you know that it’s gon’ slap, ayYeah, it’s gon’ slap, ayTell her run it back
